Subject: 5 Years of Chalhoub University: A Journey of Learning & Growth
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/696706c3692773886d1ab6dc597d24f6616875109.png> 	

5 Years of Chalhoub University: A Journey of Learning & Growth
From Vision to Impact

As Chalhoub University marks its 5th anniversary, we pause not only to celebrate a milestone, but to reflect on a remarkable journey of transformation. What began as a vision to unify and elevate learning across the Group has grown into a future-focused platform, one that has redefined how we learn, grow, and lead in new ways.

Our progress would not have been possible without each of you, our learners, ambassadors, partners, and leaders who made learning matter every day. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/07abe503ef270407c90b3747bc7d0a001464766060.gif>

chunks.text:
Our progress would not have been possible without each of you, our learners, ambassadors, partners, and leaders who made learning matter every day. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/07abe503ef270407c90b3747bc7d0a001464766060.gif> 	

In 2020, we launched Chalhoub University amidst global uncertainty, a bold step to ensure our teams had access to meaningful learning anytime, anywhere. Since then, we have re-envisioned what learning can look like, moving away from transactional, pay-per-course models toward a subscription-based ecosystem that promotes continuous, limitless development.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/26dc61dafa3cb9dff1f21d90cce2afa0924014277.gif> 	

We established 5 specialised Academies, embraced hybrid learning, and embedded flexibility and feedback at the core of our design. Our collective commitment has not gone unnoticed. With accreditations from KHDA (UAE), TVTC (KSA), and CIBTAC (UAE) we achieved over 600,000 learning hours delivered since inception. With a 2024 Net Promoter Score (NPS) of 9.57/10 and growing recognition as a strategic partner in capability building, Chalhoub University has become a regional benchmark for learning excellence.


The Next 5: Learning Reimagined
From Platform to Culture

chunks.text:
We established 5 specialised Academies, embraced hybrid learning, and embedded flexibility and feedback at the core of our design. Our collective commitment has not gone unnoticed. With accreditations from KHDA (UAE), TVTC (KSA), and CIBTAC (UAE) we achieved over 600,000 learning hours delivered since inception. With a 2024 Net Promoter Score (NPS) of 9.57/10 and growing recognition as a strategic partner in capability building, Chalhoub University has become a regional benchmark for learning excellence.


The Next 5: Learning Reimagined
From Platform to Culture

Looking ahead, our mission grows bolder. Learning with Chalhoub University will continue to be a catalyst for performance, innovation, leadership, growth and culture. The Next 5 is our commitment to you: to build a learning experience that is personal, purposeful, and measurable, placing every team member at the heart of their own development journey.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a9b1a5a8e84b064df82a75b3db4cd2eb1934719583.png> 	

From raising the impact of learning to aligning it closely with business, the Next 5 is about making learning part of how we work, every day. We will nurture a culture of individual ownership, enabling each of you to shape your own learning journey, guided by your unique aspirations and evolving roles. Together, we will continue building future-ready capabilities that prepare us to lead and win in the dynamic world of luxury retail. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/660a1df4bc0fe899bda1f059ad186e5c229995299.gif>

chunks.text:
From raising the impact of learning to aligning it closely with business, the Next 5 is about making learning part of how we work, every day. We will nurture a culture of individual ownership, enabling each of you to shape your own learning journey, guided by your unique aspirations and evolving roles. Together, we will continue building future-ready capabilities that prepare us to lead and win in the dynamic world of luxury retail. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/660a1df4bc0fe899bda1f059ad186e5c229995299.gif> 	

For Team Members
Take ownership of your growth. Stay curious. Explore the learning journeys available to you and connect them to your aspirations. Make learning a habit, reflect, share, and apply what you learn. Every step you take matters, and your individual journey inspires others.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f8574ab7b719c4cb9412c945ff15dc341412353862.gif> 	

For Leaders
Be the catalyst for learning in your teams. Lead by example through your commitment to your own development. Encourage curiosity by fostering a culture where asking questions is welcomed and valued. Enable learning by giving your teams the time, space, and accountability to grow. Your leadership will ignite a ripple effect across the Group.


Here’s to the Next 5; to bold ideas, continuous growth, and making learning a real part of how we work and lead every day.

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1212&user=10620>
